name: R5-EncounterLocationStatus-R4-EncounterLocationStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EncounterLocationStatus into a FHIR R4 EncounterLocationStatus

element.display: The patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified.A system may update these records when the patient leaves the location to either reserved, or completed.

target.display: The patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified.A system may update these records when the patient leaves the location to either reserved, or completed.

element.display: The patient was at this location during the period specified.Not to be used when the patient is currently at the location.

target.display: The patient was at this location during the period specified.Not to be used when the patient is currently at the location.

element.display: The patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.

target.display: The patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.

element.display: This location is held empty for this patient.

target.display: This location is held empty for this patient.
